Something in this basin is affecting things in the most remarkable fashion! I've seen creatures healed of old wounds, even brought back to life. If we could harness such a thing, we could avert much suffering in our world.

Bring me the hearts of some {@LinkCreature:26#2002#revivified noruks} and let us discover the secret to this mystery together!

Look at this! The heart yet beats, in a completely natural fashion. This is no undead abomination, not at all!

Perhaps the rumors of the Fountain of Shara aren't entirely groundless.
You needn't worry about angering the Forest Keepers. My work is of much interest to them and I operate with their full support.
